entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h except gusting to 40 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
